 This creates the actual DX texture for the holes map.
void updateTexture ()

void recalcHoles ()
 This recalculates allHoles_ and noHoles_ after unlocking and gets rid of the hole map if it is degenerate.

Detailed Description

This is an implementation for TerrainHoleMap for the second generation of terrain.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TerrainHoleMap2::TerrainHoleMap2 ( CommonTerrainBlock2 &  block  )  [explicit]

This is the TerrainHoleMap2 default constructor.

This represents terrain without holes.

Parameters:
block The block that the holes are for.

void TerrainHoleMap2::recalcHoles (  )  [protected]

This recalculates allHoles_ and noHoles_ after unlocking and gets rid of the hole map if it is degenerate.
